unpublishedAction.name: payment_request_query

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
payments.retailer_code,
ret.retailer_code as rtcode,
payments.payment_id, 
payments.payment_ticket_status,
payments.payment_type,
payments.payment_mode, 
payments.payment_status,
payments.amount_paid, 
payments.taxable_amt,
payments.gst_amt,
payments.transaction_id, 
TO_CHAR(payments.transaction_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as transaction_date,  
payments.payment_source,
TO_CHAR(payments.payment_start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as payment_start_date,
TO_CHAR(payments.payment_end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as payment_end_date,
payments.payment_clearance_status, 
payments.payment_received_by,
payments.remarks,
TO_CHAR(payments.created_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MM') as created_time, 
payments.created_by, 
payments.deleted,  
TO_CHAR(payments.updated_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MM') as updated_time, 
payments.updated_by,  
TO_CHAR(payments.payment_clear_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as payment_clear_date,  
payments.invoice_sent_status, 
payments.invoice_no,
ret.retailer_name,
ret.address,
ins.payment_amount as retailer_Installation_amount,
ret.amc as Retailer_AMC_amt
FROM payments
LEFT JOIN retailer as ret on payments.retailer_code=ret.retailer_code
left join installation_details ins on ret.retailer_temp_id=ins.retailer_temp_id
where payments.payment_ticket_status='OPEN' and coalesce(deleted,false)=false
order by payments.payment_id desc;

invalids: 'Query timeout' field must be an integer between 0 and 60000
